name: modapp-l10n
description: Localization utility implementing modapp's LocaleString interface.

scripts.clean: rimraf lib dist es coverage docs && mkdir docs
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development rollup src/index.js --config --sourcemap --file dist/modapp-l10n.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup src/index.js --config --file dist/modapp-l10n.min.js
